content: I'm getting messages like this on my content type that includes Paragraphs on load. Everything worked fine last week. Don't know if it's actually Paragraphs related or not. entity-error.JPG entity-error-log.JPG

It says "entity of type node," so it's probably not Paragraphs, but nodes usually aren't missing their bundles. My guess is it's probably something else (custom or contrib) that's not doing something right. Those errors are so generic, it's hard to figure out the real culprit without xdebug or loads of dpms.
I'm trying to look at a version of the site that works and see what's different. Something updated in the last week that began causing this. It just rears it's head when connected to the paragraphs.
Well, maybe Paragraphs is the contrib project that is not doing something right.
I believe I've tried both the last released version of paragraphs and your fix here. Still researching. The site version that works definitely has an older version of the Entity Plus module.

Anything else in the logs that might be potentially useful? Could you try the official Paragraphs release and Entity Plus 1.0.3? If that works, that would isolate it as recent changes in one of those two modules.
I rolled back to a version from last week when things worked. You may be off the hook with the paragraphs. The only two modules that are different are Address Field and Login Whitelist.
Okay so I reapplied the module updates and everything works. Don't know what was going on.
